IEvolutionAlgorithmHost
IDisposable
public interface
IEvolutionAlgorithmHost
EvolutionAlgorithmHostClockTime
EvolutionAlgorithmHostGenerational

Represents a host for an IEvolutionAlgorithm instance, that runs the algorithm until some defined stop condition occurs, and then returns statistics (e.g. max fitness) associated with the evolution algorithm recorded at the stop time.

Functions
Sample
Sample Sample()

Take one sample, i.e. start one instance of an evolution algorithm, wait for the stop condition, and return evolution algorithm statistics.

Returns

A new sample object that conveys the recorded statistics.
